name: Aletris farinosa

Female: Premature and profuse menses, with labor-like pains
Prolapse, with pain in right inguinal region
Leucorrhoea due to weakness and anemia
Rectum: Loads up with faeces - paretic condition
Stool large, hard, difficult, great pain

details: An anaemic, relaxed condition, especially of the female organism, is portrayed by this remedy. The patient is TIRED ALL THE TIME, and suffers from prolapsus, leucorrhoea, rectal distress, etc. Marked anaemia. Chlorotic girls and pregnant women.
